instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: आजही या भूमीवरून आस्था, अध्यात्म आणि विकासाशी संबंधित अनेक प्रकल्पांचा शुभारंभ झाला आहे.
output: आज भी इस धरती पर आस्था, अध्यात्म और विकास से जुड़े अनेक प्रोजेक्ट की शुरुआत हुई है।

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: मित्रांनो, आमच्या सरकारसाठी स्मार्ट शहर केवळ एक प्रकल्प नाही तर आमच्यासाठी एक मिशन आहे.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
input: आमच्या कार्यालयाचे लोक सतत पाठपुरावा करत राहिले. अखेरीस त्यांनी छाननी करून 400 समस्या, प्रश्नांची सूची केली.

instruction: A text is given in Hindi. Translate it from the Hindi language to the Marathi language. The translation must not omit or add information to the original sentence.
